column4: I appoligize in advance, since this is problaby considered "offtopic", but i was wondering if anyone knew of any good music authoring tool for ubuntu capable of writing sheet music as well as midi playback.
on the tip of my brain is rosegarden, but i'd have to google it to be sure it's even close to right for you
i'll check it out... dont worry about googling it... thanks :P
g/l.... also, look at the apps that the distro "dynebolic" has... there are lots of media apps you can look into
